The copy that was uploaded is played through a very fast laptop through a HDMI 1.4 cable to a sterioscopic 3D Panasonic television.  As far as I know there are problems streaming from your computer to the PS3 as far as sound delay. There dosn't seem to be any issues as far as copyright protection because the version I uploaded, my copy still works fine today, with no delay or lag.  HDMI was only tested on 1.4.  I use MPC in direct 3D mode to play the file. 
Cheers and enjoy :)
